dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2
dependencies.name: py-future

dependencies.description: Monty is the missing complement to Python.
dependencies.name: py-monty

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Python Materials Genomics is a robust materials analysis code that
defines core object representations for structures and molecules with
support for many electronic structure codes. It is currently the core
analysis code powering the Materials Project.
dependencies.name: py-pymatgen

dependencies.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependencies.name: py-pymongo

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.
dependencies.name: py-sympy

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Robocrystallographer is a tool to generate text descriptions of crystal
structures. Similar to how a real-life crystallographer would analyse a
structure, robocrystallographer looks at the symmetry, local
environment, and extended connectivity when generating a description.
The package includes utilities for identifying molecule names, component
orientations, heterostructure information, and more.
dependent_to.name: py-robocrys

description:
Matminer is a library for performing data mining in the field of
materials science.
name: py-matminer

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
